KA.AQWE.content: will a law bring enlightenment? > PUBLIC vs. PRIVATE: private is where an official obeys a law and does not apply reason > thoughts against a law do not disrupt the law, one is still dutiful
KA.AQWE.linkedContent: will a law bring enlightenment? > PUBLIC vs. PRIVATE: private is where an official obeys a law and does not apply reason > thoughts against a law do not disrupt the law, one is still dutiful

KA.EP.content: freedom: only obey laws I consent to > equality: equally treated by the law (equality can’t be confirmed like freedom because God has no equal)
KA.EP.linkedContent: freedom: only obey laws I consent to > equality: equally treated by the law (equality can’t be confirmed like freedom because God has no equal)

KA.EP.content: charity is only a conditional duty, right of others is unconditional, and hence absolutely commanding
KA.EP.linkedContent: charity is only a conditional duty, right of others is unconditional, and hence absolutely commanding
